actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. S. 2313 ordered reported as an original bill in lieu of this bill.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Clean Air and Nuclear Regulation

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Nuclear Regulatory Commission for fiscal years 1994 and 1995, and for other purposes.
short_title: Nuclear Regulatory Commission Authorization Act for Fiscal Years 1994 and 1995

summary.text: Nuclear Regulatory Commission Authorization Act for fiscal years 1994 and 1995 - Authorizes appropriations for FY 1994 and 1995 to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission and to its Office of Inspector General. Prescribes allocation guidelines.

titles.title: Nuclear Regulatory Commission Authorization Act for Fiscal Years 1994 and 1995
A bill to authorize appropriations for the Nuclear Regulatory Commission for fiscal years 1994 and 1995, and for other purposes.
